short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows multiple people to present the same Google Slides presentation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Additional presenters are able to advance slides without having to say "next slide please" constantly. It removes unnecessary distractions and the presentation delivery becomes much smoother.

Once the main presenter installs this extension, they can generate a unique link to the presentation and share it with their co-presenters.

FEATURES
🤼‍♂️ Supports up to 10 simultaneous users that can advance slides at different times.
👩‍🔧 Only the main presenter needs to install the extension. Co-presenters get a secure link to a hosted remote control.

USE CASES
💰 Pitching to investors with co-founders.
🏫 Presenting at Town Hall meetings with multiple presenters.
